description: Sky lanterns are blamed for a New Year's Eve blaze at Krefeld Zoo that killed rare apes and monkeys.
title: Krefeld zoo fire: German police suspect three women
title_page: Krefeld zoo fire: German police suspect three women - BBC News
maintext: One firefighter, Andreas Klos, said: "We were amazed that the building burned down so quickly". He noted that it did not have a sprinkler system.
